author: The Associated Press
title: NHL Capsules
text:
NHL Capsules Associated Press | 0 comments 
NEW YORK (AP) — Dan Girardi broke a tie late in the second period on a night when he passed Mark Messier for 10th on the Rangers' all-time games played list and New York beat the Calgary Flames 4-1 on Sunday. 
Oscar Lindberg, Kevin Klein and Derick Brassard also scored.
